awd_abstract_narration: The University of Georgia wishes to achieve these objectives: 1) to             expand the existing PeachNet services to include University System              outreach programs; 2) to pilot a project to create a networking                 model whereby private and public shcool systems may be integrated               into Georgia's public higher education network system; 3) to                    provide for network resource management; and 4) to provide access               to NSFNET for 45 units connected to PeachNet.  Specifically the                 following schools will be directly aided: Atlanta Metropolitain                 College, Clayton State College, Dalton College, Gainesville                     College, Gordon College, North Georgia College, and Middle Georgia              College.                                                                                                                                                        The expansion to connect the additional state supported                         institutions to PeachNet and NSFNET will provide Georgia educators              and students an opportunity to share resources with the current                 eachNet and NSFNET communities.***
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: BOARD OF REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY SYSTEM OF GEORGIA
